nodes.text: Spined pucs were a reptilian frog-like creature. Spined pucs and giant spined pucs were native to Yavin 4. Another race known as pug jumpers were native to Kashyyyk. They had leathery hides.

Spined pucs were creatures in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011. The concept art annotation shown in From Pencil to Pixel: The Art of Star Wars Galaxies initially identified the spined puc simply as "frog."
